data.title: Looksee
data.copy: I made a Chrome Extension for debugging layout on the fly. All you need to do is add a class, id, or selector. Concat them with a coma. It uses the power of sizzle syntax found in jQuery. Additionally you can apply a shader as well. This gives you a little peek as to how elements are layering in your window. The chrome extension is constently changing. Give it a shot! I would love your feedback.

data.title: Adam Biel Audio
data.copy: Made a 100% free site using modern web tools for a buddy of mine. I wanted to build something in Sveltekit because it is so much fun to work with. Created a decoupled website that uses google spreadsheets as our CMS. Sveltekit for the frontend and served with Netlify. He lets me know when he has updated some content and press the deploy button in Netlify and boom updated content goes live. All and all it was a super fun project. If you have any need for audio production give him a shout. Super talented guy.

data.title: Make Bookmarklets
data.copy: I created a bookmarklet generator with modern Javascript safeguards in place. Really enjoy making bookmarklets myself and wanted to make a site with a bit more design and ux applied than many of the current sites which do similar things.
